level.heading: Biannual assessment and funding report.
level.text: The Children and Youth Investment Corporation, or a successor single non-service provider, nonprofit organization, shall submit a biannual assessment and funding report to the Council, which includes:
A research-based needs assessment of at-risk youth, which identifies:
A list of funding priorities based upon the needs assessment.
